text: Grown Ups is a 2010 American comedy movie directed by Dennis Dugan, written by Adam Sandler and Fred Wolf. It is produced by Jack Giarraputo. Sandler who stars in the movie along with Kevin James, Chris Rock, David Spade, Rob Schneider, Salma Hayek, Maria Bello, and Maya Rudolph. ==References== Category:2010 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Dennis Dugan Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Grown Ups (movie)
